Name: Future Sight
Effect: Single Target. This Move's damage is dealt at the beginning of the next Round. Ignore Shield Moves, Force Field, Cover & Substitute. If the target restires or switches out from battle, the damage will be dealt to the next opponent or to one of its allies.
Description: The Pok√©mon foresees something terrible happening to the target. It may see images from its own future without any risk.
